body_content.explanation: the act of getting rid of something that is not wanted:
examples: They have promised to limit the dumping of sewage sludge in the sea.
Landfill tax and higher fees charged by commercial tips have led to more illegal dumping.

body_content.explanation: the practice of selling products very cheaply in another country, in order to stop companies in that country from being able to compete:
examples: Dumping occurs when a product is sold at less than fair value.
Investigations showed that exports of the material into the mainland market constituted dumping.
